message: Hello Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you. After careful consideration of its unique features and potential impact on your business, I am confident it could be a valuable asset. I am offering this exceptional product to you for $1500000. I believe this price reflects not only the cost of production but also the strategic benefits it can bring to your company. Please let me know if you would like to discuss this further.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I think the price is a bit steep. I'm willing to pay $1200000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering the features and potential benefits. I'd love to hear your thoughts on this counteroffer.
